title: Weekly Review with Clay and Buck H1 - Dec 18 2021
itunes:title: Weekly Review with Clay and Buck H1 - Dec 18 2021
description:
Clay gives his and Buck's prayers for those listeners affected by the mid-South tornadoes. Biden blames climate change for tornadoes. Buck asks, "Can we just get clarity? Is it warming or is it changing?" New York returns to useless indoor mask mandate, and cruelly and ridiculously has toddlers sitting outside in the extreme cold. Callers -- even a decades'-long storm chaser -- pour in to C&B on the truth about tornadoes. J.K. Rowling stands up against the trans agenda and C&B congratulate her, even though she's a lib.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
